title: Drugs and Supplements
description: Look up information about prescription drugs, over-the-counter medications, herbs, vitamins and supplements.
cleaned_text: Look up prescription and over-the-counter drug information Mayo Clinic does not endorse companies or products. Advertising revenue supports our not-for-profit mission.
